data.name: Chill Corner - Mood & Vibes (Vol 2)
data.detailed_description:
This DLC added several new acoustic and lofi soundtracks with the primary instrument being Piano and Guitar follow the "Mood & Vibes" topic.
Added new exclusive decoration
data.about_the_game:
This DLC added several new acoustic and lofi soundtracks with the primary instrument being Piano and Guitar follow the "Mood & Vibes" topic.

data.short_description: This DLC added several new acoustic and lofi soundtracks with the primary instrument being Piano and Guitar follow the "Mood & Vibes" topic.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Vietnamese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, French, Polish, German, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
